metadata.title: CVE-2019-1999 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In binder_alloc_free_page of binder_alloc.c, there is a possible doublefree due to improper locking. This could lead to local escalation ofprivilege in the kernel with no additional execution privileges needed.User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: Android.Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-120025196.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
